Posts.Content: Hi I had my first EC last Saturday and used the cold cap. I took 2 paracetamol about 30mins before and have to say there was nothing to it. The first 10mins are the worst they say but to be honest it didn't affect me in the slightest. I felt a bit cold about an hour into it but just asked for another blanket. It maybe different the next time I use it but gonna keep using it.
Posts.Title: AC Chemo

Posts.Content: I rang and spoke to my oncologist secretary last Thursday and asked for a picc line. He was off so was going to speak to the under dog. Anyway recieved a letter yesterday and I'm having mine put in on Friday same day my next chemo is. Ring and ask for one. Xx
Posts.Title: Chemo every week for 12 weeks Taxol
